“The Fall of Slade” part two! Father and son clash when Jericho flies to rescue Deathstroke from Jericho’s ex—the resurrected Dr. Ikon! Meanwhile, Terra is summoned to an ambush by the Forgotten, the deadly leader of the White Lotus, and worlds collide as the New Super-Man demands Deathstroke’s arrest!

Includes a code for a free digital download of this issue.

On a search for the rare element Splodium-235, ZIM discovers that deep beneath his own base lies another alien base. And inside it is another alien. And this alien claims he took over the Earth years ago. Is he insane? More importantly, can ZIM steal his supply of Splodium-235 and get out? Or will he keep ZIM in his base forever because... well... he's just so lonely down there?

FANTASTIC THREE PART 3

Who's behind the stretchy, fiery, wispy and rocky thefts going on all around town?

Has the Fantastic Four turned to a life of crime - waitaminute, there ain't no more FF anymore!

It's all up to Lunella Lafayette to solve the case!
2018-01-29|2018-02-04.name: 1+2 = Fantastic Three Part Three of Six: Elementary

2018-01-29|2018-02-04.description:
Wild Game

Sun-Tzu reveals what his life was like before the Kazoop came to Earth. Meanwhile, Nate Josephson, Chopper, Martha Cortez, & Che lead a patrol to check out reports of auto hijackings on a remote coastal road.
2018-01-29|2018-02-04.name: Wild Game

2018-01-29|2018-02-04.description: With the battle against Metropoliman finally over and Mukaido dead, Mirai and Saki now must deal with the aftermath. Can Mirai keep his emotions in check after having had a hand in so many deaths? And what exactly happened to Metropoliman before his downfall...?
2018-01-29|2018-02-04.name: Chapter 27: At the Same Table

2018-02-05|2018-02-11.description:
SPIDER-MAN VERSUS DEADPOOL Part 4

Peter Parker and Wade Wilson are in their eighties and live in the same nursing home. Wait, WHAT?!

The madness of this book gets a brief interlude in the form of a story from the future! But this is not a throwaway issue!

This issue is the first prelude to the biggest Spider-Man and Deadpool story of all time that will come to fruition in JULY OF 2018! DO NOT MISS IT!
2018-02-05|2018-02-11.name: Area 14 Part 1

2018-02-12|2018-02-18.description:
TEENAGE WASTELAND Part 3

ZOE, MIKE, GABE and NAKIA are all-in!

The MS. MARVELS? The MS's? Whatever you call them, this group is holding up the legacy of Ms. Marvel and taking the fight to the INVENTOR!

But RED DAGGER is going to have his hands full if he wants to lead this ragtag bunch to victory!
2018-02-12|2018-02-18.name: Teenage Wasteland Part Three

2018-02-19|2018-02-25.description:
BRAND-NEW STORYLINE

“OLD WORLDS,” Part One!

The origins of the Harvesters are finally revealed as we jump back thousands of years to see the dawn of the robotkind and the the secrets of the Ancient Robot and how it connects to Tim-21 in the present.

Secrets that have been building since issue one are finally revealed in this shocking new story arc.

Each issue in this arc will feature "LITTLE ROBOT" variant covers by DUSTIN NGUYEN.

2018-03-26|2018-04-01.description:
“DAWN OF TIME” part one! Chronos has spent his criminal career being defeated by Ray Palmer and the Justice League. But now he’s discovered a way to beat them: by traveling back in time to stop the concept of super heroes from ever coming to be, because a world without the Justice League is a world he can rule! How can the team follow him through the timestream to stop his mad plan?

Atom (Ray Palmer) is fighting Chronos in the the Microverse, while Preon and Yun Xee have been knocked to the side. Chronos injures Atom, prompting Atom to telepathically call Yun Xee for help, who blasts Chronos's mind allowing Atom to gain the upper hand. Defeated and at the Atom's mercy Chronos mocks him, saying he has seen "the Imprint." He then slips away into the timestream, leaving Atom with a threat against his very existence.

The rebuilding of Mount Justice is in full swing, though far from completed, when a member of the construction crew radio's Vixen with something interesting. The entire League heads down to the new subbasements being built to investigate and find a small crater with glowing purple lights. Inside are what looks to be human prints, which upon scanning them Atom (Ryan Choi) finds are saturated with 4-D energy. Batman is in the midst of saying they have to dig deeper, when Ryan belt begins to beep an alert. Killer Frost (Kaitlin Snow) ask's what it is, when she is overcome with the feeling of Deja Vu and Ryan replies that it's normal to feel that way, when in the presence of chrono reactive energy, that his mentor's arch nemesis Chronos produces.

A proximity alarm rings drawing the Leaguers and as they race to the source, when a hole in the time stream opens up. Out of it streams numerous Techno-Chiefs taken and turned against from Darkseid, as well as Chronos. The Ray jets towards Chronos over confidently and is hit by one of Chronos' time pins stopping him in his tracks. Chronos then proceeds to incapacitate Killer Frost, put Batman in a never ending time loop and then confront Ryan one on one, as the others are busy fighting the Techno-Chiefs.

Chronos insults Ryan of his unworthiness to take up the mantle of his mentor, while Ryan keeps up his banter with the villain, to stall until his teammates dealt with the other threats. Aztec flies in attacking Chronos, breaking his concentration so the others could free themselves and surprises him when she reveals she's protected from his manipulation abilities due to her suit. Chronos tosses tiny hourglasses at their feet, which turn out to be explosives , giving him enough time to escape.

Ryan gives chase while the rest of the Leaguers wrap up the remaining Techno-Chiefs, but he catches up to Chronos too late, watching the villain disappear just as his teammates arrive. He tells them, they don't have to give chase with him, but Batman immediately shuts him down, saying they're a team. All seven Leaguers step into the time stream, stepping out millions of years in the past and are met by a beautiful world. The scene is quickly ruined as Chronos comes into view surrounded by out of time soldiers riding atop of dinosaurs and at the center, on his knees in chains in front of Chronos is Ahl, the superhero god.

And when Robin forces the team to do some “Spring Cleaning,” they discover sentient, angry dust bunnies—and things go downhill from there. Is the team toast?

2018-04-16|2018-04-22.description:
“FRACTURE: PRELUDE,” Part One

Four years ago, Jonah Carlyle was spared execution by his sister, Forever. This is what happened next. The critically acclaimed series returns to set the stage for the events of X+67 and beyond—and the coming Fracture.
2018-04-16|2018-04-22.name: Fracture: Prelude, Part One

PREPARE FOR THE WEDDING OF THE CENTURY!

LYDIA NANCE, the anti-mutant lobbyist, and 0101, the most advanced Sentinel on the planet, have found each other.

Their goal?

Kill the X-Men - starting with COLOSSUS.

With the Original Five X-Men lost in space, a new team of mutants has emerged to face the White Queen, Havok, Miss Sinister and Bastion!

But while the new X-Men are away, the Marauders will play, striking viciously at Magneto.

Magneto is forced to make a terrible decision, leading him ever closer to the darkness he has tried to put behind him.

2018-05-14|2018-05-20.description:
CONTINUING THE UNSEEN EVENTS OF THE FORCE AWAKENS!

Poe Dameron managed to escape the First Order - but only just! Meanwhile, the rest of Black Squadron is on their most daring mission yet. Follow everyone's favorite Resistance crew as Poe Dameron tells Rey and Finn his adventures during the events of The Force Awakens!

As Lord Drakkon's power and influence grows, the Power Rangers work with new allies from across time and dimensions, including Ranger teams such as Time Force, RPM, and Samurai, to craft a plan to fight back...but is it already too late?

Haunted by visions of the past and berated by his guard, Soranik, the former Green Lantern takes out his anger on a new arrival. But then an attack on the prison might soon spell disaster for the Green Lantern Corps.

2018-07-02|2018-07-08.description:
Having successfully passed Gloxinia and Drole’s special training, King and Diane return from the past, where they learned a dark truth about their fellow comrade, Gowther. Back in the present with their memories intact, Diane and King reunite with the rest of The Seven Deadly Sins—and come face-to-face with Gowther! Diane swears she’ll help Gowther reclaim the heart he lost, but when Gowther would rather erase his memories than relive his painful past, it may be a task easier said than done …

2018-07-09|2018-07-15.description:
With their headquarters under siege and overrun with monsters, the Scooby gang has to split up and seek shelter in the city. But when they realize that other plague-survivors are still trapped in the mall, the gang must decide whether to mount a rescue operation—or abandon their friends.

Round one of the Spring Tournament begins! Karasuno faces off against Tsubakihara Academy, a team that’s come to nationals for the second year in a row. Mistakes and problems pile up as the huge gymnasium begins to mess with Karasuno’s ability to navigate the court. Kageyama begins to acclimate to the new environment, but the Tsubakihara players aren’t pushovers…and they have a secret weapon!

2018-09-24|2018-09-30.description:
You can’t go home again. But that’s just where Barbara Gordon, a.k.a. Batgirl, is forced to go when the chip granting her mobility keeps shorting out in the aftermath of her clash with Grotesque. Will Commissioner Gordon drive Babs totally bonkers with his bedside manner? Or will the malfunctioning tech impact more than just her legs? Plus, what’s the deal with killer art critic Grotesque and his murderous new M.O.? It’s all in part two of “Art of the Crime.”

2018-10-08|2018-10-14.description:
Everything changed for the Red Hood last issue. This time around, everything changes for Jason Todd! Devoid of partners and exiled from Gotham City, Jason gets a fateful message from the last person he expected to see again. The news he learns leaves him with no choice but to don the Red Hood mask once more and double down on his two-fisted crimefighting approach. Pray for whoever gets in Jason’s way as “The Outlaw” kicks into high gear.

Newly awakened metahuman Ionbound suffers a fateful transformation that rocks the Titans team to their core. If they can’t save these Source Wall victims, what good is their latest mission? But does this development hold the key to helping them? Or is it a harbinger of more death and destruction to come? That’s a lot of questions to answer; good thing there are two issues this month to cover all that ground!
